Method Detail

storeContextData

public void storeContextData(ContextData contextdata,
                             VirtualMachine virtualMachine)
Store context data to the local repository. The following context data is stored: 1) Security Keys 2) End Points 3) Software Dependencies 4) License Tokens 5) Entire SP manfiest 6) Bootstrap script TODO: Refactor reducing duplication of code used for directory and file operations...

Parameters:
contextdata - Used to access the security keys applied at the service level.
virtualMachine - The virtual machine to store context data for.

create

public Iso create()
           throws SystemCallException
Create an ISO using its associated attributes and stored context data.

Returns:
The ISO created.
Throws:
SystemCallException - Thrown if the command to create the ISO via a system call fails.
